title: What role carries the hardest in low elo?
body:
So I've been finding it really hard to carry in low elo. Like, my win rate is higher then 50 percent (it's 52.7% out of 277 games) but even when I do get fed, I feel like the top laner can always one shot me due to the fact that nobody peels for me. But what's your opinion on what role can carry the hardest in Bronze 1 - Silver 3 elo?

Edit: After looking through the comments, it seems like the solo lanes and jg carry the hardest. Since I already have friends that play in the jg and mid lane, what would be a good champion to play in the top lane? Preferably a one trick (cuz i think one tricks are really cool)

replies.body: Jungle by far, carry via objectives and map control is really the best way.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

You have impact on the whole map, shelly & dragon can provide good bonuses for your whole team.
The answer is yes.
ah ok.

tbh low elo games have been so unpredictable for me sometimes they are super easy and enemies play like bots and sometimes they play like smurfs people will try to give u a one tip that fits all but i don't think it's that simple
Jungle, since people will be out of place frequently and you can capitalize on their greed. If you want to carry from top lane, pick a splitpusher champ.
It falls down to whatever role with which you are most comfortable and successful. You play what you know, what you enjoy and I guarantee you will win more than half your matches.
Yeah, and I do, but in ranked games I always feel like i'm just hoping that our solo lanes get fed.
idk UwU {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
wow thanks sooo much for your very valuable input viv{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Bruisers is the role that carry the hardest, because you can fight everyone and the fact that they don't know how to deal with one is hilarious. They will go 1 by 1 vs a bruisers.
jungle if you can play it right. {{champion:20}}  is the best for that after securing a scuttle crab.
all of em are easy to carry low elo with, you should be asking about champions not roles.
Top lane is the only role that really matters in any elo now. So
Both the solo lanes are the best roles to carry with.

Support.

Well, I had no problem getting to gold from silver 4 as support.
low elo. u can carry with any role.
